title: 关于distance的问题
author: _sy_
txt_content:
execute at @e[type=minecraft:snowball,distance=] run fill ~1 ~1 ~1 ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 air replace
那个distance我想设成与玩家之间的距离怎么搞
他总是以命令方块为原点
版本1.15

replies.author: suyuhan0504
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 suyuhan0504 于 2020-2-21 09:19 编辑 

execute as [玩家选择器] at @s run execute at @e[type=minecraft:snowball,distance=(这里写上参数)] run fill ~1 ~1 ~1 ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 air replace
原理就是让玩家进行检测
[说的不太好,看看下面dalao的吧]

replies.author: _sy_
replies.txt_content:
suyuhan0504 发表于 2020-2-21 09:17
execute as [玩家选择器] at @s run execute at @e[type=minecraft:snowball,distance=(这里写上参数)] run ...
66，谢啦
